name: Tag Manager by RocketCode
author: RocketCode

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to add Google Tag Manager scripts to your WordPress site. With this plugin, you can easily add your Google Tag Manager ID and the script will be automatically added to your site’s head and body tags.

Usage

Once the plugin is installed and activated, the Google Tag Manager scripts will be added to your site automatically. You can check in your website source code, in the head and body tags, to see if the script is being added correctly.

Disclaimer

By installing this plugin, you agree to use it at your own risk. The plugin is provided “as is” and we are not responsible for any damages caused by the use or incompatibility of the plugin. We make no guarantees that the plugin will work as intended and we are not liable for any loss or damage caused by the plugin.

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
(at your option) any later version.

  1. Tag Manager by RocketCode 1.1 settings
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/rocketcode_GTM directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to the plugin settings page and add your Google Tag Manager ID
